text: The People's Action Party (PAP) is a large centre-right political party in Singapore. It is one of two main parties in the Parliament of Singapore, with the other being the Workers' Party. It was started in 1954 and supported Singapore being independent from Malaysia. It has been in charge of Singapore since the 1959 general election."A History of Singapore: Lion City, Asian Tiger". Discovery Channel. 2005. == Leadership == The current chairman of the PAP is Deputy Prime Minister Heng Swee Keat.
